ComicInfo.Summary:
Featuring an interview with Steve Gerber, a heated letters section, and a piece on the 1978 “DC Implosion.”
The interview with Steve Gerber in this issue, shortly after his dismissal from Marvel, can be read online here: http://www.tcj.com/the-steve-gerber-interview/
